Class GreedyAI.DangerBuckets

  • java.lang.Object
    • AI.GreedyAI.DangerBuckets
  • Enclosing class:
    GreedyAI

     class GreedyAI.DangerBuckets
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for sorting moves by danger probability and returning the best local move option

      (package private) int getBestMove()
      Get a random move from the smallest probability bucket I.e, from the smallest not empty bucket, get a random move from it (to avoid a directional bias)
